name: nightmare (itch) (Ertuiop123)
description:
this game has been made for the brackeys game jam 2022.1! (clearly didn't have enough time to finish but it's mostly my fault since the game jam lasted one entire week)

INSTRUCTIONS: 

- move with WASD and aim with mouse

- the goal is to make it until the morning by shooting on the ghosts (you protect yourself sleeping)

- there's only one power up that will spawn and it basically kills every ghost on the map

That's it...
